text: Weyprecht Glacier () is a glacier in Jan Mayen. It is the longest glacier located in the Beerenberg area.Weyprecht Glacier, Jan Mayen - Geographical Names The glacier is named after Austro-Hungarian Arctic explorer Karl Weyprecht. ==See also== *List of glaciers in Norway *Svalbard and Jan Mayen ==References== ==External links== * Glacier retreat in Jan Mayen * Glaciers of Jan Mayen Category:Glaciers of Jan Mayen
title: Weyprecht Glacier
